page.title: 20E.Hagbourne area-conclusions
page.content: It is important to note that although East Hagbourne and the other villages are close to Didcot, with its fast and frequent rail services to London and Oxford, the majority of residents have lived in the area for at least 6 years and many of them for over 20years. There have been few newcomers to the area and generally it has not seen the new housing developments that have marked the expansion of many South Oxfordshire villages in recent times - a fact most residents applaud! This survey has been carried out by pupils at St Birinus School for boys, Didcot, with the aid of Humanities staff. Most of the work was carried out by first year boys, but boys from other years have made significant contributions.
